death.attack.starDrain: %1$s had their life and energy drained by magic.
death.attack.starDrain.player: %1$s had their life and energy drained by magic while trying to escape %2$s.
death.attack.waterBurn.player: %1$s tried to swim in water to escape %2$s.
ds.cave_dragon_choice: Deep inside you, the red-hot lava begins to roar. You have become a §cCave dragon.§r
ds.forest_dragon_choice: You feel the need for raw meat and are covered in grass scales. You have become a forest dragon. You have chosen to be a §aForest dragon.§r
ds.sea_dragon_choice: The stormy sea and fishes beckon you. Now you are a §3Sea dragon.§r
ds.choice_human: You have chosen to become a human.
ds.wings.nohunger: You are too hungry to fly
ds.you.have.no.wings: You have §cno wings§r. You need to talk to the Ender dragon.
ds.dragon.grants.wings: <Ender dragon> I bestow wings on you. Now get out of here!
ds.space.occupied: You need a 3x3 area to place
ds.invalid_grow_item: §6You need another type of growth artifact:§r %1$s
ds.gui.tab_button.2: Lore will not be available anytime soon
ds.gui.customization.confirm.all:
With your current settings all progress will be lost when you change.



Would you still like to continue?
ds.gui.customization.confirm.ability:
With your current settings your growth progress will be lost when you change.
You will still keep your ability progress

Would you still like to continue?
ds.gui.customization.confirm.growth:
With your current settings your ability progress will be lost when you change.
You will still keep your growth progress

Would you still like to continue?
dragonsurvival:config.category.general.t: General config options for Dragon Survival
ds.endmessage.1: Have you come here for the spin wings, {0}? Get out, before its too late.
ds.endmessage.2: This is my land, {0}, show some respect. Go away, but first answer, why have you come here. Is it for spin wings?
ds.endmessage.3: You have gone through lot to get here, {0}, what do you wish?
ds.altar_dragon_info.cave_dragon:
§c■ Cave dragon.§r
§2■ Features:§f§r fire resistance, pickaxe claws, fire magic, faster movement on cave blocks.
§4■ Weakness:§r water.
§6■ Ration:§r
{0}
ds.altar_dragon_info.forest_dragon:
§a■ Forest dragon.§r
§2■ Features:§f§r soft fall, axe claws, poison magic, faster movement on forest blocks.
§4■ Weakness:§r dark caves.
§6■ Ration:§r
{0}
ds.altar_dragon_info.sea_dragon:
§3■ Sea dragon.§r
§2■ Features:§f§r underwater breathing, shovel claws, electric magic, faster movement on sea blocks.
§4■ Weakness:§r dry air.
§6■ Ration:§r
{0}
ds.altar_dragon_info.human:
■ §nHuman.§r
■ Homo sapiens.§r
Traveler, builder and creator.
ds.skill.help.claws:
■ This is the §6dragon inventory§r.
§7■ Differences from the vanilla inventory: 3x3 craft, expanded window where your whole dragon fits, claw panel, button to sort items.§r
■ Any dragon is born with strong §6claws and teeth§r, but you can make them even better! Just put §6any tools§r§f here in these slots and your bare paw will have stronger characteristics.
§7■ Does not stack with «Claws and Teeth» skill, which affects only if these slots are empty.
ds.help.source_of_magic:
■ The source of magic can be filled with parts of Elder dragon. Spends 1 item every 10 seconds.
■ Crouch + right click to use.

■ §6+10 sec§r - Elder Dragon Dust
■ §6+50 sec§r - Elder Dragon Bone
■ §6+100 sec§r - Dragon Heart Shard
■ §6+300 sec§r - Weak Dragon Heart
■ §6+1000 sec§r - Elder Dragon Heart
ds.skill.description.storm_breath:
■ Elemental breath: a stream of sparks. Targets become §c«Electrified»§r and deal electric shock damage to each other. The more targets affected, the more damage dealt. 

■ Range depends on the age of the dragon. Makes creepers charged. During a storm will summon thunderbolts.
ds.skill.description.ball_lightning:
■ Ranged attack: shoots out a ball lightning. Deals area damage and §celectrifies§r enemies.

■ During rain and storms, lightning can strike the ball.
ds.skill.description.revealing_the_soul:
■ Massive buff: temporary increases amount of §2experience§r gained from monsters. 

■ Has a limit of maximum amount of experience you can gain at a time. Effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight.
ds.skill.description.sea_eyes:
■ Personal buff: providing §2Night Vision§r for a short time.

■ Effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight.
ds.skill.description.sea_magic:
■ Magic points (Mana) are used for dragon magic. Restores on wet blocks.

■ Current amount of §2{0}§r mana:
 - §2{1}§r from «Sea Magic»
 - §2{2}§r from level of dragon
ds.skill.description.sea_athletics:
■ Running on some blocks will give you §2Speed {1}§r

■ Duration: §2{0}§rs
ds.skill.description.water:
■ Increases out-of-water survival time. Will help you to stay alive a little longer in deserted regions and Nether.

■ Duration: §2{0}§rs
ds.skill.description.spectral_impact: ■ Gives §c{0}%§r chance to make your attack ignore enemy armor.
ds.skill.description.sea_claws_and_teeth:
■ Sea dragons §2can§r deal increased damage and dig loose blocks without tools. They are getting stronger with age.

■ §cCannot§r ride horses and use several items.
ds.skill.description.sea_wings:
■ Dragons use §2levitation§r to fly, but they are rarely born with the knowledge of it. Only one dragon in this world can share this power with you.

■ Enable flight: [{0}]
ds.skill.description.sea_wings.has_spin: ■ You are able to §2spin§r in air and in water. Just use the attack.
ds.skill.description.sea_wings.no_spin: ■ You have not yet unlocked the ability to §cspin§r in air and in water.
ds.skill.description.sea_dragon:
■ Sea dragons are made of water and gold. Their diet includes a variety of seafood. Peaceful animals fear dragons.

■ They have innate immunity to lightning and §2unlimited oxygen§r§7. They feel best in the sea.§r
ds.skill.description.amphibian:
■ Sun and dryness are the main foes of sea dragons. If they are out-of-water for too long, they begin to take damage.

■ The skill «Water», effect «Sea Peace», rain, ice, snow and water bottles §7could make your life easier.

■ Damage: §c{0} points in {1}s§r
ds.skill.description.poisonous_breath:
■ Elemental breath: a toxic gas. Creates area of §c«Forest Gas»§r effect, which is deadly for creatures, but boosts plant grow speed.

■ Range depends on the age of the dragon. Cannot be used while affected by «Stress»."
ds.skill.description.spike: ■ Ranged attack: shoots out a sharp §cdart§r, which flies a large distance. Less effective underwater.
ds.skill.description.inspiration:
■ Massive buff: provides effect §2Haste III§r for all nearby creatures.

■ Effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight.
ds.skill.description.hunter:
■ Personal buff: providing §2Hunter§r effect, which allows you to become invisible in grass. Faster running. First melee strike of the hunter has §c{0}§r damage bonus.

■ Effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight. Effect is nullified after being hurt.
ds.skill.description.forest_magic:
■ Magic points (Mana) are used for dragon magic. Restores under direct sunlight and on grass.

■ Current amount of §2{0}§r mana:
 - §2{1}§r from «Forest Magic»
 - §2{2}§r from level of dragon
ds.skill.description.forest_athletics:
■ Running on wooden or grassy blocks will give you §2Speed {1}§r

■ Duration: §2{0}§rs
ds.skill.description.light_in_darkness:
■ Allows you to stay longer in a dark.

■ Time until effect «Stress» appear in low light level: §2{0}s§r.
ds.skill.description.cliffhanger: Landing becomes much softer. Safe fall distance: §2{0}b§r.
ds.skill.description.forest_claws_and_te:
■ Forest dragons §2can§r deal increased damage and chop down trees without tools. They are getting stronger with age.

■ §cCannot§r ride horses and use several items.
ds.skill.description.forest_wings:
■ Dragons use §2levitation§r to fly, but are rarely born with that ability. Only one dragon in this world can share this power with you.

■ Enable flight: [{0}]
ds.skill.description.forest_wings.has_sp: ■ You are able to §2spin§r in air and in water. Just use the attack.
ds.skill.description.forest_wings.no_spi: ■ You have not yet unlocked the ability to §cspin§r in air and in water.
ds.skill.description.forest_dragon:
■ Forest dragons are made up of diamonds and predatory plants. Their diet includes raw meat and sweet berries. Peaceful animals fear dragons.

■ They have innate §2immunity to thorn bushes and cacti§r§7. They feel best on the surface.
ds.skill.description.fear_of_dark:
■ Predatory plants in the body of the forest dragon do not like §dDarkness§r. If the light level is lower than {0}, §c«Stress»§r effect appears which resets saturation and quickly decreases hunger value.

■ The skill «Light the Dark» and effect «Forest Magic» §7could make your life easier.
ds.skill.description.nether_breath:
■ Elemental breath: a stream of fire that ignites enemies. Creates an area on the surface with §c«Burn»§r effect. Range depends on age of the dragon.

■ Destroys some of the blocks. Cannot be used under water and during the rain.
ds.skill.description.fireball: ■ Ranged attack: shoots out a fireball that §cexplodes§r and sets the area on fire.
ds.skill.description.strong_leather:
■ Massive buff: provides temporary §2armor§r for all nearby creatures.

■ The effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight.
ds.skill.description.lava_vision:
■ Personal buff: making lava more §2transparent§r for a while.

■ Effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight.
ds.skill.description.cave_magic:
■ Magic points (Mana) are used for dragon magic. Restores on hot blocks.

■ Current amount of §2{0}§r mana:
 - §2{1}§r from «Cave Magic»
 - §2{2}§r from level of dragon
ds.skill.description.cave_athletics:
■ Running on stone surfaces will give you §2Speed {1}§r

■ Duration: §2{0}§rs
ds.skill.description.contrast_shower:
■ Rain, snow and snowfall do not damage you for: §2{0}§rs

■ Water, poisons and snowballs are still dangerous
ds.skill.description.burn:
■ Your target has a {0}% chance to receive the §c«Burned»§r effect from your attacks.

The effect deals damage when the target moves.

The faster the movement, the more damage is done.

■ Creatures with fire resistance are immune to this effect.
ds.skill.description.cave_claws_and_teet:
■ Cave dragons §2can§r deal increased damage and mine stone blocks without tools. They are getting stronger with age.

■ §cCannot§r ride horses and use several items.
ds.skill.description.cave_wings:
■ Dragons use §2levitation§r to fly, but are rarely born with that ability. Only one dragon in this world can share this power with you.

■ Enable flight: [{0}]
ds.skill.description.cave_wings.has_spin: ■ You are able to §2spin§r in air and in lava. Just use the attack.
ds.skill.description.cave_wings.no_spin: ■ You have not yet unlocked the ability to §cspin§r in air and in lava.
ds.skill.description.cave_dragon:
■ Cave dragons are made of netherite and lava. Their diet includes charred meat and coal. Peaceful animals fear dragons.

■ They have innate §2immunity to fire§r and they feel best in the Nether.
ds.skill.description.hot_blood:
■ Cave dragons take §cdamage from water§r, snow, rain and other liquids due to their fiery nature.

■ The skill «Contrast Shower» and effect «Cave Fire» §7could make your life easier.

■ Damage: §c{0} points in {1}s§r
ds.description.caveDoor: ■§7 A large door that only a cave dragon can open.
ds.description.forestDoor: ■§7 A large door that only a forest dragon can open.
ds.description.seaDoor: ■§7 A large door that only a sea dragon can open.
ds.description.legacyDoor: ■§7 The very first big door we added to the mod. Just for nostalgia.
ds.description.grayHelmet: ■§7 Poor hunter. Fortunately, you didn't know him.
ds.description.goldHelmet: ■§7 You surely remember that the knight wore dark armor. Where did the golden helmet come from?
ds.description.blackHelmet: ■§7 You should have used the Eye of Innos.
ds.description.dragonBeacon: ■§7 Required to create dragon beacons. Silk touch is required. When crafting a vanilla beacon returns.
ds.description.passivePeaceBeacon: ■§7 Gives the effects «Sea Peace» and «Animal Calm». Best for sea dragons. Peaceful animals stop running away from the dragon. You can buy the effect on the right click. Requires a silk touch.
ds.description.passiveMagicBeacon: ■§7 Gives the effects «Forest Magic» and «Anti-Predator». Prohibits predator spawning. Best for forest dragons. You can buy the effect on the right click. Requires a silk touch.
ds.description.passiveFireBeacon: ■§7 Gives the effects «Cave Fire» and «Sturdy Skin». Gives extra armor. Best for cave dragons. You can buy the effect on the right click. Requires a silk touch.
ds.description.dragonMemoryBlock: ■§7 If set under any dragon beacon, you can get its effect in the area without having to buy it.
ds.description.dragonAltar: ■§7 Block to turn into a dragon and decor.
ds.description.predatorStar: ■§7 Block that you will hate with all your soul.
ds.description.heartElement:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 Fragment from a little dragon's heart. Used for newborn dragon's growth.
ds.description.weakDragonHeart:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 Strengthened, but still unstable heart. Used for young dragon's growth.
ds.description.elderDragonHeart:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 The Heart that is radiant and full of energy. If you listen, you can hear elder voice calling you from the depths. Used for adult dragon's growth.
ds.description.elderDragonDust:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 The smallest particle left from an ancient creature. Used in many dragon crafts.
ds.description.elderDragonBone:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 The remains of small dragons that were created from the body of an elder creature. Used in many dragon crafts.
ds.description.starBone: ■§7 This item slightly reduces the dragon's height. Throw the Ancient Dragon's bone into the magical predator's star to create.
ds.description.starHeart: ■§7 Totally stops the growth of the dragon. When reapplied, it returns. No wasting.
ds.description.caveDragonTreat: ■§7 Fully restores a cave dragon's magic power and it is good for restoring hunger.
ds.description.forestDragonTreat: ■§7 Fully restores a forest dragon's magic power and it is good for restoring hunger.
ds.description.seaDragonTreat: ■§7 Fully restores a sea dragon's magic power and it is good for restoring hunger.
ds.description.chargedCoal: ■§7 Can be used to melt a large number of items.
ds.description.chargedSoup: ■§7 The best food for the cave dragon. Gives the effect "Cave Fire" that protects from the damaging effects of water.
ds.description.wing_grant: ■§7 This item gives your dragon the skill to fly. Use repeatedly to remove wings.
ds.description.spin_grant: ■§7 This item gives your dragon the skill to fly spin. Use repeatedly to remove fly spin.
ds.description.treasures: ■§7 Dragons can sleep and regenerate mana and health very slowly here. To speed up this process, accumulate really a lot of treasure. The main purpose is to show the richness of a dragon.
ds.description.cave_source_of_magic: ■§7 Cave dragons can gets infinite mana here. Deals damage to other creatures.
ds.description.forest_source_of_magic: ■§7 Forest dragons can gets infinite mana here. Deals damage to other creatures.
ds.description.sea_source_of_magic: ■§7 Sea dragons can gets infinite mana here. Deals damage to other creatures.
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.yours: ■ This is what §6you§r look like now.
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.random: ■ Shows a random skin of §6other players§r§f. You §ccan't install§r§f them yourself!§7 Only look and admire! >:D
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.help:
■ §6Skin§r is a self-made texture for your dragon. In this tab you can disable the display of the skin for your dragon at different stages, as well as skins of other players.
§7■ If you are interested in how to make your own skin or take a commission, use the buttons on the right.
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.discord: ■ Join our §6discord server§r!§7 Read the Rules, FAQ and Wiki before you ask anything.
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.wiki: ■ This is a link to §6WikiFandom§r dedicated to making your own skin!§7 Remember that this will be very difficult and requires knowledge of graphic editors.
ds.gui.skins.noskin: This author does not have a skin for this stage.
ds.gui.skins.noskin.yours: You do not have a skin for this stage.
ds.gui.claws.rendering: Toggle showing of claws and teeth.
ds.client.firstperson.firstPersonRotatio: Use rotation of your tail in first person, otherwise the tail is always opposite of your camera. If the tail is constantly climbing in your face, put false.
Render dragon model in first person. If your own tail scares you, write false
ds.client.firstperson.renderFirstPersonF: Render dragon model in first person while gliding. We don't advise you to turn it on.
ds.client.flight.flightCameraMovement.to: Should the camera movement while gliding as a dragon be enabled
ds.client.flight.flightZoomEffect.toolti: Should the zoom effect while gliding as a dragon be enabled
ds.client.flight.jumpToFly.tooltip: Should flight be activated when jumping in the air
ds.client.flight.lookAtSkyForFlight.tool: Is it required to look up to start flying while jumping, requires that jumpToFly is on
ds.client.flight.notifyWingStatus.toolti: Notifies of wing status in chat message
ds.client.flight.othersSpinParticles.too: Should other players particles from spin attack be shown for you?
ds.client.flight.ownSpinParticles.toolti: Should particles from your own spin attack be displayed for you?
ds.client.flight.renderOtherPlayerRotati: Should the rotation effect during gliding of other players be shown?
ds.client.inventory.alternateHeldItem.to: Should held items be rendered as if you are in third-person even in first person as a dragon?
ds.client.inventory.dragonInventory.tool: Should the default inventory be replaced as a dragon?
ds.client.inventory.dragonTabs.tooltip: Should dragon tabs be added to the default player inventory?
ds.client.inventory.inventoryToggle.tool: Should the buttons for toggeling between dragon and normaly inventory be added?
ds.client.inventory.thirdPersonItemRende: Should the third person item render for dragons use the default rotations? Use this if modded items are rendering weird when held.
ds.client.misc.appleskinSupport.tooltip: Disable this setting to disable support for appleskin as a dragon if it is causing ui issues
ds.client.rendering.armorRenderLayer.too: Should the armor be rendered as a layer on the dragon? Some shaders requires this to be off. Can cause some weird effects with armor when turned off.
ds.client.rendering.enableTailPhysics.to: Enable movement based physics on the tail, this is still a working progress and can be buggy.
ds.client.rendering.renderAdultSkin.tool: Do you want your dragon skin to be rendered as a adult dragon?
ds.client.rendering.renderDragonClaws.to: Should the tools on the claws and teeth be rendered for your dragon?
ds.client.rendering.renderItemsInMouth.t: Should items be rendered near the mouth of dragons rather then hovering by their side?
ds.client.rendering.renderNewbornSkin.to: Do you want your dragon skin to be rendered as a newborn dragon?
ds.client.rendering.renderOtherPlayerSki: Should other player skins be rendered?
ds.client.rendering.renderYoungSkin.tool: Do you want your dragon skin to be rendered as a young dragon?
ds.client.rendering.rotateBodyWithCamera: Should the body rotate with the camera when turning around.
ds.client.tooltips.alwaysShowHelpTooltip: Always show the help tooltip border
ds.client.tooltips.dragonFoodTooltips.to: Should dragon foods have their tooltip color changed to show which type of dragon can consume it?
ds.client.tooltips.helpTooltips.tooltip: Should the effect of the help tooltips be enabled?
ds.client.tooltips.tooltipChanges.toolti: Should the mod be allowed ot change the color and appearance of tooltips?

The predator can only spawn in biomes with the included types.

ds.server.bonuses.bonuses.tooltip: Set to false to toggle off all dragon bonuses and play as human.
ds.server.bonuses.cave.caveSpeedupBlocks: Blocks cave dragons gain speed when standing above. Formatting: block/tag:modid:id
ds.server.bonuses.cave.fireImmunity.tool: Whether cave dragons are immune to fire damage types.

The maximum number of ticks a cave dragon can swim in lava. Set to 0 to allow unlimited air while under lava.
Range: {0}
ds.server.bonuses.cave.lavaSwimming.tool: Set to false to disable cave dragon fast lava swimming.

ds.server.bonuses.forest.bushImmunity.to: Whether forest dragons are immune to Sweet Berry Bush damage.
ds.server.bonuses.forest.cactiImmunity.t: Whether forest dragons are immune to Cactus damage.

How many blocks of fall damage is mitigated for forest dragons. Set to 0.0 to disable.
Range: {0}

ds.server.bonuses.healthMod.tooltip: Apply a health modifier for dragons. The older the dragon, the more health it has.
ds.server.bonuses.newbornJump.tooltip:
Jumping height for a newborn dragon. Default is 1 block.
Range: {0}

ds.server.bonuses.sea.waterBonuses.toolt: Whether sea dragons gain bonus swim speed and unlimited air.

The speed effect level for dragon block-specific speedups. Set to 0 to disable.
Range: {0}

Attack modifier for young dragons.
Range: {0}

Jumping height for a young dragon. Default is 1.5 block.

The chance for dragon heart shards to drop from any mobs with max health between 14-20

The chance for dragon heart shards to drop from any mobs with max health above 50

ds.server.food.chargedSoupBuffDuration.t:
How long in seconds should the cave fire effect from charged soup last. (Default to 5min) Set to 0 to disable.

ds.server.food.dragonFoods.tooltip: Force dragons to eat a unique diet for their type.
ds.server.food.hurtfulToCaveDragon.toolt: Items which will cause damage to cave dragons when consumed. Formatting: item/tag:modid:itemid:damage
ds.server.food.hurtfulToForestDragon.too: Items which will cause damage to forest dragons when consumed. Formatting: item/tag:modid:itemid:damage
ds.server.food.hurtfulToSeaDragon.toolti: Items which will cause damage to sea dragons when consumed. Formatting: item/tag:modid:itemid:damage

How long of a cooldown in seconds the altar has after each use.
Range: {0}
ds.server.general.canMoveInEmote.tooltip: If players are allowed to move while performing emotes
ds.server.general.canMoveWhileCasting.to: If you should be able to move while casting certain skills or if player movement can be prevented.
ds.server.general.harvestableStarBlock.t: Whether silk touch hoes can be used to harvest Predator Stars.
ds.server.general.keepClawItems.tooltip: Whether to keep items in the claw slots on death otherwise they will drop on death.
ds.server.general.syncClawRender.tooltip: If players are allowed to hide their claws and teeth from other players. If it is important to you to see your opponent's weapon during pvp, set false.
ds.server.growth.adultGrowthModifier.too:
A multiplier to change the growth rate from adult to a full sized adult. At 1.0 it takes about 3 days to become a dragon of maximum adult size.
Range: {0}
ds.server.growth.alternateGrowing.toolti: Defines if dragon should grow without requirement of catalyst items. Your dragon will just grow over time.
ds.server.growth.growAdult.tooltip: List of items to grow adult dragon. Format: item/tag:modid:id
ds.server.growth.growNewborn.tooltip: List of items to grow newborn dragon. Format: item/tag:modid:id
ds.server.growth.growYoung.tooltip: List of items to grow young dragon. Format: item/tag:modid:id
ds.server.growth.largerDragonHitbox.tool: Whether the dragon hitbox grows past a human hitbox.
ds.server.growth.maxGrowthModifier.toolt:
A multiplier to change the growth rate from full sized adult to max size. The change in growth after the maximum adult size is measured in months and years.
Range: {0}
ds.server.growth.maxGrowthSize.tooltip:
Defines the max size your dragon can grow to. Values that are too high can break your game. It is not advisable to set a number higher than 60.
Range: {0}
ds.server.growth.maxHealth.tooltip:
Maximum health dragons can grow to.
Range: {0}
ds.server.growth.minHealth.tooltip:
Dragon starting health. Minumum health dragons will start off with.
Range: {0}
ds.server.growth.newbornGrowthModifier.t:
A multiplier to change the growth rate from newborn to young. At 1.0 it takes about 3 hours to turn a newborn dragon into a young dragon.
Range: {0}
ds.server.growth.reachBonus.tooltip:
The bonus that is given to dragons at ever 60 size. Human players have 1.0x reach and a size 60 dragon will have 1.5x distance with default value. Only applies to block mining.
Range: {0}
ds.server.growth.saveGrowthStage.tooltip: Should the growth stage of a dragon be saved even when you change. Does not affect the saving progress of magic (use saveAllAbilities). The author does not approve of weredragons, but if you insist...
ds.server.growth.sizeChangesHitbox.toolt: Whether the dragon size determines its hitbox size. The bigger the dragon, the bigger the hitbox. If false standard player's hitbox be used.
ds.server.growth.youngGrowthModifier.too:
A multiplier to change the growth rate from young to adult. At 1.0 it takes about 1 day to turn a young dragon into a adult dragon.
Range: {0}

Whether you are able to use all types of source of magic no matter your dragon type.

ds.server.treasure.maxTreasures.tooltip:
The max amount of additional treasure that can be used to reduce the regen time
Range: {0}
ds.server.treasure.treasureHealthRegen.t: Whether sleeping on treasure will recover health or not.
ds.server.treasure.treasureRegenTicks.to:
The time in ticks it takes to recover 1hp while sleeping on treasure. Keep in mind that there is 1 treasure in mind. A large number of treasures in one place reduces time.

ds.server.treasure.treasureRegenTicksRed:
The amount of ticks each additional treasure reduces the regen time by
Range: {0}
ds.server.wings.allowFlyingWhenTotallyHu: Whether dragons can fly when totally hungry. You can't open your wings if you're hungry.
ds.server.wings.alternateFlight.tooltip: Whether to use flight similar to creative rather then gliding.
ds.server.wings.enableFlightFallDamage.t: Whether fall damage in flight is included. If true dragon will take damage from the fall.
ds.server.wings.enderDragonGrantsSpin.to: Whether you should be able to obtain the spin ability from the ender dragon.
ds.server.wings.flightHungerThreshold.to:
If the player's hunger is less then or equal to this parameter, the wings will be folded even during flight.
Range: {0}
ds.server.wings.flightSpinCooldown.toolt:
The cooldown in seconds in between uses of the spin attack in flight
Range: {0}
ds.server.wings.flyingUsesHunger.tooltip: Whether you use up hunger while flying.
ds.server.wings.foldWingsOnLand.tooltip: Whether your wings will fold automatically when landing. Has protection against accidental triggering, so the wings do not always close. If you always need to close the wings manually.
ds.server.wings.lethalFallDamage.tooltip: Whether fall damage from flight is lethal, otherwise it will leave you at half a heart
ds.server.wings.maxFlightSpeed.tooltip:
Maximum acceleration fly speed up and down. Take into account the chunk load speed. A speed of 0.3 is optimal.
Range: {0}
